channel.title: BUpolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUpolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Treasury Secretary Bessent announces five finalists to replace Powell as Fed chairman
item.description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent on Monday announced the names of five finalists to replace Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell, with President Trump ...

item.title: Trump is willing to meet with North Korean leader Kim while he's in East Asia for APEC forum
item.description: President Trump said he would be willing to extend his Asia trip if North Korean dictator Kim Jong-un wanted to meet him.

item.title: Trump doesn't plan to meet Canadian PM Mark Carney during Asia trip, leaving trade in turmoil
item.description: President Trump said Monday he does not plan to meet Canada's leader "for a long time," signaling that his anger over an anti-tariff ad hasn't subside...

item.title: Trump refuses to rule out third term, points to polling and good physical exam
item.description: President Trump refused to rule out running for a third term while speaking with reporters on Monday, despite the Constitution limiting presidents to ...

item.title: New York mayoral candidate Zohran Mamdani rallies voters with support from Bernie Sanders and AOC
item.description: New York mayoral candidate Zohran Mamdani rallied supporters Sunday with heavyweight support from U.S. Sen. Bernie Sanders and Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-...

item.title: DHS Launches Operation River Wall to Secure Rio Grande Valley
item.description: DHS’s Operation River Wall will surge U.S. Coast Guard assets to waterways at our southern border to target illegal immigration, transnational crimina...

item.title: FBI Arrests Palestinian Terrorist … in Louisiana

item.title: Portlandia is Nutty. Their News Media Thinks you are too.
item.description: Portland, Oregon, has been a sanctuary city since 2017. There is no ambiguity: “Sanctuary City” is even in the title of the ordinance. Despite what is...

item.title: Local Law Enforcement Partnerships with ICE are Rapidly Rising

item.title: New Border Crossing Numbers are a Blast from the Past

item.title: Trump's approval holds steady despite unpopular policies, per new NYT poll
item.description: Trump’s strength with Republicans on the economy could prove to be a boon for the GOP.

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Trump is selling a strong economy. Voters aren’t buying it.
item.description: Privately, aides concede voters remain uneasy about prices but argue their policies are beginning to turn things around.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
